FuncDef: This command configures the time to live (TTL) value entered in the IP header of packets sent to an EBGP peer multiple hops away.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the TTL value, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 255.

ExtraInfo: Default: multihop 1 - EBGP peers are directly connected.multihop 64 - IBGP
